resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106604</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106604</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206979</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Building America's Industrial Revolution: The Boott Cotton Mills of Lowell, Massachusetts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebäude-Amerikas Industrielle Revolution: 
Die Boott Baumwollspinnereien von Lowell, Massachusetts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Révolution Industrielle de l'Amérique de 
Bâtiment : Les filatures de coton de Boott de Lowell, le 
Massachusetts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Volta Industrial De América Do Edifício: Os
moinhos de algodão de Boott de Lowell, Massachusetts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro Industriale Dell'America Della Costruzione: 
I cotonifici di Boott di Lowell, Massachusetts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίζοντας βιομηχανική επανάσταση της Αμερικής: 
Οι μύλοι βαμβακιού Boott του Lowell, Μασαχουσέτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revolución Industrial De América Del Edificio: 
Las fábricas de algodón de Boott de Lowell, Massachusetts</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features one of the oldest surviving textile mill complexes in the U.S. Learn how technology revolutionized the textile-manufacturing industry, and, in turn, affected mill architecture, city planning, and transportation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Merkmale eins der ältesten 
Überlebentextiltausendstelkomplexe in den VEREINIGTEN STAATEN 
erlernen, wie Technologie die Gewebe-Herstellung Industrie 
revolutionierte, und der Reihe nach betroffene Tausendstelarchitektur,
Stadtplanung und Transport.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les dispositifs un des complexes de moulin de 
textile de survie les plus anciens aux ETATS-UNIS apprennent comment 
la technologie a révolutionné l'industrie de textile-fabrication, 
et, à leur tour, architecture de moulin, planification de ville, et 
transport affectés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as características uma dos complexos os mais 
velhos do moinho de textile sobreviver nos ESTADOS UNIDOS aprendem 
como a tecnologia revolutionized a indústria do 
textile-textile-manufacturing, e, por sua vez, arquitetura do moinho, 
planeamento de cidade, e transporte afetados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le caratteristiche una di più vecchi complessi del
laminatoio della tessile di sopravvivenza negli STATI UNITI imparano 
come la tecnologia ha rivoluzionato l'industria di 
tessile-textile-manufacturing e, a loro volta, architettura del 
laminatoio, pianificazione di città e trasporto affected.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει ενός από τον παλαιότερο επιζόντα 
υφαντικό μύλο περιπλέκει στις ΗΠΑ μαθαίνει πώς η τεχνολογία 
ξεσήκωσε την υφαντικός-κατασκευαστική βιομηχανία, και, στη 
συνέχεια, είχε επιπτώσεις στην αρχιτεκτονική μύλων, τον 
προγραμματισμό πόλεων, και τη μεταφορά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las características una de los más viejos 
complejos del molino del textil el sobrevivir de los ESTADOS UNIDOS 
aprenden cómo la tecnología revolucionó la industria de la 
textil-fabricacio'n, y, alternadamente, configuración del molino, las
hojas de operación (planning) de ciudad, y transporte afectados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206979</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106604</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/building-americas-industrial-revolution-the-boott-cotton-mills-of-lowell-massachusetts</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
